short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sail into the sunset with Luffy's adventurous spirit, stunning visuals, and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set sail with Monkey D. Luffy against a breathtaking sunset over the ocean in this stunning live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A vibrant interface inspired by Luffy’s adventurous spirit, featuring warm sunset hues of orange, red, and gold, with a serene ocean backdrop.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements the tranquil beauty of a sunset at sea.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into One Piece-themed mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as bold and limitless as Luffy’s dreams.
